biotools.summary: Web-based catalogue of structural information that describes the icosahedral virus particles. In addition to high-resolution crystal structures, it has expanded to include virus structures obtained by cryo-electron microscopy (EM) techniques. This database is a powerful resource for virologists, microbiologists, virus crystallographers and EM researchers.

bioschemas.name: VIPERdb
